verses.verse: But <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> diligently my <S%H4405>speech,<s%> and let <S%H2063>this<s%> be your <S%H8575>consolations.<s%>
<S%H5375>Suffer<s%> me that I may <S%H1696>speak;<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that I have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H3932>mock<s%> on.
As for me, is my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> to <S%H120>man?<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> it were so, <S%H4069>why<s%> should not my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> be <S%H7114>troubled?<s%>
<S%H6437>Mark<s%> me, and be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> and <S%H7760>lay<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> on your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Even <S%H518>when<s%> I <S%H2142>remember<s%> I am <S%H926>afraid,<s%> and <S%H6427>trembling<s%> <S%H270>takes<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> on my <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
<S%H4069>Why<s%> do the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H6275>become<s%> <S%H6275>old,<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> are <S%H1396>mighty<s%> in <S%H2428>power?<s%>
Their <S%H2233>seed<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> in their <S%H6440>sight<s%> with them, and their <S%H6631>offspring<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
Their <S%H1004>houses<s%> are <S%H7965>safe<s%> from <S%H6343>fear,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> on them.
Their <S%H7794>bull<s%> <S%H5674>engenders,<s%> and <S%H1602>fails<s%> not; their <S%H6510>cow<s%> <S%H6403>calves,<s%> and <S%H7921>casts<s%> not her calf.
They <S%H7971>send<s%> forth their <S%H5759>little<s%> ones like a <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and their <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H7540>dance.<s%>
They <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H8596>tambourine<s%> and <S%H3658>harp,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H5748>organ.<s%>
They <S%H1086>spend<s%> <S%H3615><s%> their <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H2896>wealth,<s%> and in a <S%H7281>moment<s%> <S%H5181>go<s%> <S%H5181>down<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave.<s%>
Therefore they <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H5493>Depart<s%> from us; for we <S%H2654>desire<s%> not the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of your <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
<S%H4100>What<s%> is the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> that we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> him? and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3276>profit<s%> should we have, <S%H3588>if<s%> we <S%H6293>pray<s%> to him?
<S%H2005>See,<s%> their <S%H2898>good<s%> is not in their <S%H3027>hand:<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H7350>far<s%> from me.

<S%H4100>How<s%> oft is the <S%H5216>candle<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1846>put<s%> out! and how oft <S%H935>comes<s%> their <S%H343>destruction<s%> on them! God <S%H2505>distributes<s%> <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> in his <S%H639>anger.<s%>
They are as <S%H8401>stubble<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and as <S%H4671>chaff<s%> that the <S%H5492>storm<s%> <S%H1589>carries<s%> <S%H1589>away.<s%>
<S%H433>God<s%> <S%H6845>lays<s%> up his <S%H205>iniquity<s%> for his <S%H1121>children:<s%> he <S%H7999>rewards<s%> him, and he shall <S%H3045>know<s%> it.
His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H3589>destruction,<s%> and he shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>

For <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> has he in his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, when the <S%H4557>number<s%> of his <S%H2320>months<s%> is <S%H2686>cut<s%> off in the <S%H2686>middle?<s%>
Shall any <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge?<s%> seeing he <S%H8199>judges<s%> those that are <S%H7311>high.<s%>
One <S%H4191>dies<s%> in his <S%H8537>full<s%> <S%H6106>strength,<s%> being <S%H3605>wholly<s%> at <S%H7946>ease<s%> and <S%H7961>quiet.<s%>
His <S%H5845>breasts<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2461>milk,<s%> and his <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H8248>moistened<s%> with <S%H4221>marrow.<s%>
And <S%H2088>another<s%> <S%H4191>dies<s%> in the <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> with <S%H2896>pleasure.<s%>
They shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H3162>alike<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and the <S%H7415>worms<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> them.
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H4284>thoughts,<s%> and the <S%H4209>devices<s%> which you <S%H2554>wrongfully<s%> <S%H2554>imagine<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me.
For you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H346>Where<s%> is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H5081>prince?<s%> and <S%H346>where<s%> are the <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H168>places<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked?<s%>
Have you not <S%H7592>asked<s%> them that <S%H5674>go<s%> by the <S%H1870>way?<s%> and do you not <S%H5234>know<s%> their <S%H226>tokens,<s%>
That the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> is <S%H2820>reserved<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H343>destruction?<s%> they shall be <S%H2986>brought<s%> forth to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>wrath.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> to his <S%H6440>face?<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H7999>repay<s%> him what he has <S%H6213>done?<s%>
Yet shall he be <S%H2986>brought<s%> to the <S%H6913>grave,<s%> and shall <S%H8245>remain<s%> in the <S%H1430>tomb.<s%>

The <S%H7263>clods<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> shall be <S%H4985>sweet<s%> to him, and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> shall <S%H4900>draw<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, as there are <S%H369>innumerable<s%> <S%H4557><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.
<S%H349>How<s%> then <S%H5162>comfort<s%> you me in <S%H1892>vain,<s%> seeing in your <S%H8666>answers<s%> there <S%H7604>remains<s%> <S%H4604>falsehood?<s%>
